tutorial_steps.text: Welcome to this demo! Tutorial Engine is a simple tool to highlight objects and UI to explain how your game or app works!
You can highlight any GameObject. Just ensure it has a Renderer or Collider on it!
This is an action button, you cannot click it yet, as it's behind the tutorial. It will be clickable during the next step.
Now this button is clickable! It has been pushed in front thanks to the new "make clickable" option. So you can optionally click it or just go to the next step.
This button is clickable and replaces the "NEXT" button so the user cannot avoid clicking on it, and it will trigger the next step action!
Note that this tutorial can not be skipped, you have the option when you launch each tutorial!
Great! This tutorial is done. To launch the next one, click this button after this tutorial is over!
